name: visio-meet
description: Meet is a self-hosted video meeting platform using WebRTC. It provides rooms, screensharing, and chat in a browser-based interface for secure, private conferencing.

features.title: Video Conferencing
features.description: Host video meetings with multiple participants using WebRTC technology

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share your screen with meeting participants for presentations and collaboration

features.title: Chat Messaging
features.description: Send text messages during meetings for questions and side conversations

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Host meetings on your own infrastructure without third-party data access

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Join meetings from mobile devices with responsive web interface
